alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 5:01PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Box Elder County through 530 PM MDT... At 500 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Park Valley, or 35 miles southwest of Snowville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Locomotive Springs. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 60 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
